description: Unique identifier for the tax record; used as the primary key.
Audit timestamp of the most recent creation or update for this row (likely yyyymmddHHMMSSmmm; confirm with SME).
Human-readable description shown in user interfaces and reports for this tax.
Short code or category label identifying the jurisdiction or type of tax.
Percentage rate applied to the taxable amount for this tax.
Identifier from a prior system used for migration or cross-reference; confirm with SME.
Source table name from a prior system for lineage or migration mapping; confirm with SME.
Flag indicating the record is inactive and should not be used for new transactions.
Rate used to compute an additional fee associated with this tax; interpreted per the calculation method.
Method for calculating the fee (percentage, flat amount, etc.); confirm valid codes with SME.
Boolean indicating whether the fee is applied against the invoice value rather than another base amount.
